description: Interact with Jira to create, update, search, and manage issues and projects. Supports creating issues, updating issue fields, searching with JQL, getting issue details, adding comments, and managing transitions.
explanation: This plugin provides comprehensive Jira integration capabilities. It can create new issues, update existing ones, search using JQL queries, retrieve issue details, add comments, and transition issues through workflows. Authentication is handled via API tokens configured in the system.

inputDefinitions.name: action
inputDefinitions.description: The Jira action to perform: createIssue, updateIssue, searchIssues, getIssueDetails, addComment, transitionIssue, getProjects

inputDefinitions.name: payload
inputDefinitions.description: The action-specific payload containing parameters for the Jira operation

inputGuidance: Required inputs: 'action' (the operation to perform) and 'payload' (operation-specific parameters). For createIssue, payload should include project, summary, description, issueType. For updateIssue, include issueKey and fields to update. For searchIssues, include jql query. For getIssueDetails, include issueKey. For addComment, include issueKey and comment. For transitionIssue, include issueKey and transitionId.

outputDefinitions.name: result
outputDefinitions.description: The result of the Jira operation, structure varies by action

outputDefinitions.name: error
outputDefinitions.description: Error message if the operation failed

semanticDescription: Comprehensive Jira integration for issue management, project tracking, and workflow automation
usageExamples: Create a new bug in project ABC
Search for all open issues assigned to me
Transition issue PROJ-456 to In Progress
